result.arabic_text: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا
result.translation: 28.Nanu ken ginneeh gino keenik karriqqi hayne, kaadu nanu bayisnam fannek, bayissi ken hayneh ken innah yan maray kayrih keenik yayse ciggiilisiyyah ciggiilisenno.
